chat_history.message:
Hello, 
My product iPhone 13 has the above problem: 
The glass on the front side has a 5mm long scratch. This doesn't fit with the selected category Excellent. Can you send a replacement? After that, I'll send back the damaged device.

Thank you for your help,

Dear ecomobile

The customer has contacted us and informed us that he would like a refund. Please process the refund within the deadline. 

Thank you for your understanding and have a nice weekend.


Regards,
Belgin from the Back Care Team

Hallo,

der Verkäufer kann die Rücksendung aufgrund des folgenden Problems noch nicht durchführen: Produkt ist mit Code/Muster gesperrt.
Er hat weitere Details in dieser Nachricht hinterlegt: Dear Backcare,

The phone is locked with a code. Kindly assist the customer in unlocking their device. Thank you for your understanding and cooperation.

Regards,
JY

Hello ecomobile, 

the code is 123456.

With best regards, 
Kubra, Back Market Customer Care

Dear Backcare,

We have processed the refund. Thank you for your understanding and cooperation.

Regards,
KW
